# Archaeological Ensemble of Tárraco

| criteria      = (ii), (iii)
| ID            = 875
| coordinates   =
| year          = 2000
| danger        =
| area          =
| buffer_zone   =
| locmapin      = Spain
| map_caption   =
}}
Archaeological Ensemble of Tárraco is inscribed as UNESCO world heritage site since 2000. It is situated in Tarragona.
List of monuments
It consists of the following monuments:
